languages.text:
The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes its turn.
If an ally kills a trailed enemy:
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +<u>(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2)</u> MP.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is reset.</indent>
When {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.
! Only a single enemy can be trailed at a time.
languages.original_text:
Охотник за головами отмечает противника в радиусе 10 клеток, накладывая на него эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}преследование{/g}, после чего завершает свой ход.
Если союзник убивает преследуемого:
-<indent=5%>Сразу после хода этого союзника охотник за головами получает дополнительный ход. Ему дается столько же {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, сколько у него было сразу после применения {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Взять след{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Охотник за головами получает +<u>(2 + {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}ранг противника{/g} / 2)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} дополнительно.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Период восстановления{/g} {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Взять след{/g} завершается.</indent>
Когда {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Взять след{/g} используется в третий раз за бой, охотник за головами восстанавливает 1 заряд {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Законной добычи{/g}.
! Нельзя преследовать более одного врага единовременно.

traits.locale_text: The Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as trailed and finishes the turn. Trailed: All allies gain +20% hit chance against a trailed enemy, +30% if the enemy's difficulty tier is more or equal to V. If an ally kills a trailed enemy: - The Hunter gains an additional turn after that ally's turn, with all action and movement points remaining at the moment the Hunter used Hot on the Trail. - The Hunter gains an additional +(2 + target difficulty tier / 2) MP. - The cooldown of Hot on the Trail is reset. When Hot on the Trail is used for the third time during combat, the Hunter recovers 1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey.

The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes its turn.
If an ally kills a trailed enemy:
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +<u>(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2)</u> MP.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is reset.</indent>
When {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.
! Only a single enemy can be trailed at a time.

The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes its turn.
If an ally kills a trailed enemy:
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +<u>(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2)</u> MP.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is reset.</indent>
When {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.
! Only a single enemy can be trailed at a time.

The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes the turn. Trailed: All allies gain +7% hit chance against a trailed enemy, +15% if the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is more than or equal to V. If an ally kills a trailed enemy: -The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used Hot on the Trail. -The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2) MP. -The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Hot on the Trail is reset. When Hot on the Trail is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of Hunt Down the Prey.

The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes the turn.
If an ally kills a trailed enemy:
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +<u>(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2)</u> MP.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is reset.</indent>
When {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.
! Only a single enemy can be trailed at a time.

languages.text:
赏金猎人指定周围10格内的一名敌人，对其施加{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追踪{/g}效果，并结束此回合。
如果盟友杀死了拥有“追踪”效果的敌人：
- <indent=5%>赏金猎人在该盟友的回合结束之后，立刻获得一个额外回合。赏金猎人在此回合中的{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}，以赏金猎人使用{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}紧随其后{/g}能力时计算。</indent>
- <indent=5%>赏金猎人获得额外的移动点数，等同于<u>（2+目标难度等级/2）</u>点。</indent>
- <indent=5%>立刻重置{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}紧随其后{/g}的{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}冷却时间{/g}。</indent>
当赏金猎人在战斗中第三次使用{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}紧随其后{/g}时，赏金猎人{g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}击杀猎物{/g}能力的使用次数恢复1次。
！同一时间只能有一名受“追踪”效果影响的敌人。

- <indent=5%>赏金猎人获得额外的移动点数，等同于<u>（2+目标难度等级/2）</u>点。</indent>

！同一时间只能有一名受“追踪”效果影响的敌人。

languages.text:
El cazarrecompensas designa a un enemigo en un radio de 10 casillas como {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}rastreado{/g} y termina su turno.
Si un aliado mata a un enemigo rastreado:
-<indent=5%>El cazarrecompensas gana un turno adicional tras el turno de ese aliado, con los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} que tuviera en el momento de usar {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Seguir el rastro{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%> El cazarrecompensas gana +<u>(2 + nivel de desafío del objetivo / 2)</u> PM adicionales.</indent>
- <indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Seguir el rastro{/g} se reinicia.</indent>
Cuando {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Seguir el rastro{/g} se usa por tercera vez durante el combate, el cazarrecompensas recupera +1 carga de {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Cazar a la presa{/g}.
! No puede rastrearse más de un enemigo a la vez.
languages.original_text:
The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes its turn.
If an ally kills a trailed enemy:
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g}.</indent>

When {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.
! Only a single enemy can be trailed at a time.

traits.locale_text:
El cazarrecompensas designa a un enemigo en un radio de 10 casillas como {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}rastreado{/g} y termina su turno.
Si un aliado mata a un enemigo rastreado:
-<indent=5%>El cazarrecompensas gana un turno adicional tras el turno de ese aliado, con los {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} que tuviera en el momento de usar {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Seguir el rastro{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%> El cazarrecompensas gana +<u>(2 + nivel de desafío del objetivo / 2)</u> PM adicionales.</indent>
- <indent=5%>El {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} de {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Seguir el rastro{/g} se reinicia.</indent>
Cuando {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Seguir el rastro{/g} se usa por tercera vez durante el combate, el cazarrecompensas recupera +1 carga de {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Cazar a la presa{/g}.
! No puede rastrearse más de un enemigo a la vez.

languages.text:
バウンティハンターが半径10セル以内の敵を{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追跡中{/g}と指定してターンを終了する。
味方が追跡中の敵を倒した場合：
-<indent=5%>味方のターンの後、バウンティハンターが{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}猛追{/g}を使用した後に残ったすべての{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}および{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}を保有した状態でバウンティハンターが追加ターンを獲得する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>バウンティハンターのMPが+<u>(2 + ターゲットの脅威度レベル / 2)</u>増加する。</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}猛追{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウ{/g}ンがリセットされる。</indent>
戦闘中に{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}猛追{/g}が3回使用されると、バウンティハンターの{g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}獲物狩り{/g}のチャージが+1回復する。
! 一度に追跡対象にできる敵は1体のみ。

-<indent=5%>Сразу после хода этого союзника охотник за головами получает дополнительный ход. Ему дается столько же {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g}, сколько у него было сразу после применения {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Взять след{/g}.</indent>

-<indent=5%>{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Период восстановления{/g} {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Взять след{/g} завершается.</indent>
Когда {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Взять след{/g} используется в третий раз за бой, охотник за головами восстанавливает 1 заряд {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Законной добычи{/g}.
! Нельзя преследовать более одного врага единовременно.

Охотник отмечает противника в радиусе 10 клеток, накладывая на него эффект {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}преследование{/g}, после чего завершает свой {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ход{/g}. Преследование: Все союзники получают +20% к {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шансу попадания{/g} против преследуемого. Если его {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}уровень сложности{/g} выше или равен V, союзники получают +30% к шансу попадания. Если союзник убивает преследуемого: - Сразу после хода этого союзника охотник получает дополнительный ход. Ему дается столько же {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}очков действия{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}движения{/g}, сколько у него было сразу после применения Взять след. - Охотник получает +(2 + уровень сложности цели / 2) {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPointsSpace}ОП{/g} дополнительно. - Период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g} Взять след завершается. Когда Взять след используется в третий раз за бой, охотник восстанавливает 1 заряд Законной добычи.

languages.text:
Der Kopfgeldjäger definiert einen Gegner in einem Radius von 10 Feldern als {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}verfolgt{/g} und beendet seinen Zug.
Wenn ein Verbündeter einen verfolgten Gegner tötet:
-<indent=5%>Der Kopfgeldjäger erhält nach dem Zug dieses Verbündeten einen Zusatzzug mit allen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, die der Kopfgeldjäger zum Zeitpunkt des Einsatzes von {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Heiß auf der Spur{/g} hatte.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Der Kopfgeldjäger erhält zusätzlich +<u>(2 + Schwierigkeitsstufe des Ziels / 2)</u> BP.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Heiß auf der Spur{/g} wird zurückgesetzt.</indent>
Wird {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Heiß auf der Spur{/g} im Kampf zum dritten Mal eingesetzt, regeneriert der Kopfgeldjäger +1 Ladung {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Die Beute zur Strecke bringen{/g}.
! Es kann immer nur ein Gegner verfolgt werden.
languages.original_text:
The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes its turn.
If an ally kills a trailed enemy:
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +<u>(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2)</u> MP.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is reset.</indent>
When {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.
! Only a single enemy can be trailed at a time.

traits.locale_text:
Der Kopfgeldjäger definiert einen Gegner in einem Radius von 10 Feldern als {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}verfolgt{/g} und beendet seinen Zug.
Wenn ein Verbündeter einen verfolgten Gegner tötet:
-<indent=5%>Der Kopfgeldjäger erhält nach dem Zug dieses Verbündeten einen Zusatzzug mit allen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, die der Kopfgeldjäger zum Zeitpunkt des Einsatzes von {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Heiß auf der Spur{/g} hatte.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Der Kopfgeldjäger erhält zusätzlich +<u>(2 + Schwierigkeitsstufe des Ziels / 2)</u> BP.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Heiß auf der Spur{/g} wird zurückgesetzt.</indent>
Wird {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Heiß auf der Spur{/g} im Kampf zum dritten Mal eingesetzt, regeneriert der Kopfgeldjäger +1 Ladung {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Die Beute zur Strecke bringen{/g}.
! Es kann immer nur ein Gegner verfolgt werden.

Der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} legt einen Feind innerhalb eines 10-Felder-Radius als {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}verfolgt{/g} fest und beendet seinen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g}. Verfolgt: Alle Verbündeten erhalten +7 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} gegen einen verfolgten Feind und sogar +15 %, falls die {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} des Feindes mindestens V entspricht. Wenn ein Verbündeter einen verfolgten Feind tötet: -Der Kopfgeldjäger erhält einen Zusatzzug nach dem Zug des betreffenden Verbündeten, und zwar mit allen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, die zum Zeitpunkt, zu dem der Kopfgeldjäger Heiß auf der Spur eingesetzt hat, übrig waren. -Der Kopfgeldjäger erlangt zusätzlich +(2 + Ziel-Schwierigkeitsstufe / 2) BP. -Die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} von Heiß auf der Spur wird zurückgesetzt. Wenn Heiß auf der Spur im Kampf zum dritten Mal eingesetzt wird, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger +1 Ladung von Jagd auf die Beute machen zurück.

languages.text:
Le chasseur de primes applique l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}Traque{/g} à un ennemi se trouvant dans un rayon de 10 cases et termine son tour.
Si un allié élimine un ennemi traqué :
-<indent=5%>Le chasseur de primes bénéficie d'un tour supplémentaire après le tour de son allié, et peut employer les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} qui lui restaient au moment où il a utilisé {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sur la Piste{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Le chasseur de primes bénéficie de +<u>(2 + niveau de difficulté de la cible / 2)</u> PD supplémentaires.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sur la piste{/g} est réinitialisé.</indent>
Lorsque {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sur la piste{/g} est déclenché pour la troisième fois au cours d'un même combat, le chasseur de primes récupère +1 charge de {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Traque de la proie{/g}.
! Il ne peut pas y avoir plus d'un adversaire traqué à la fois.
languages.original_text:
The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes its turn.
If an ally kills a trailed enemy:
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +<u>(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2)</u> MP.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is reset.</indent>
When {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.
! Only a single enemy can be trailed at a time.

traits.locale_text:
Le chasseur de primes applique l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}Traque{/g} à un ennemi se trouvant dans un rayon de 10 cases et termine son tour.
Si un allié élimine un ennemi traqué :
-<indent=5%>Le chasseur de primes bénéficie d'un tour supplémentaire après le tour de son allié, et peut employer les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} qui lui restaient au moment où il a utilisé {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sur la Piste{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Le chasseur de primes bénéficie de +<u>(2 + niveau de difficulté de la cible / 2)</u> PD supplémentaires.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sur la piste{/g} est réinitialisé.</indent>
Lorsque {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sur la piste{/g} est déclenché pour la troisième fois au cours d'un même combat, le chasseur de primes récupère +1 charge de {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Traque de la proie{/g}.
! Il ne peut pas y avoir plus d'un adversaire traqué à la fois.

Le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Chasseur de Primes{/g} applique l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}Traque{/g} à un ennemi situé dans un rayon de 10 cases autour de lui et le {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} se termine. Traque : Tous les alliés ont +7 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} à un ennemi sous l'effet de Traque, +15 % si le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} de l'ennemi est supérieur ou égal à V. Si un allié élimine un ennemi sous l'effet de Traque : - Le Chasseur de Primes obtient un tour supplémentaire après le tour de cet allié, avec tous les {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} restants après l'utilisation de Sur la Piste. - Le Chasseur de Primes bénéficie de +(2 + niveau de difficulté de la cible / 2) PD supplémentaires. - Le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}délai de récupération{/g} de Sur la Piste est réinitialisé. Lorsque Sur la Piste est utilisé pour la troisième fois au cours d'un combat, le Chasseur de Primes récupère +1 charge de Traque de la Proie.

languages.text:
Ödül Avcısı, 10 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}izlenen{/g} olarak belirler ve turunu sonlandırır.
Bir dost birim, izlenen bir düşmanı öldürürse:
-<indent=5%>Ödül Avcısı, bu dost birimin turunun ardından bir ek tur kazanır. Bu turda Ödül Avcısı'na {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sıcak Takip{/g} kullandığı an sahip olduğu miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} verilir.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ödül Avcısı, +<u>(2 + hedefin zorluk derecesi / 2)</u> kadar ilave HP kazanır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sıcak Takip'in{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} sıfırlanır.</indent>
{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sıcak Takip{/g}, çatışmada üçüncü kez kullanıldığında Ödül Avcısı, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Av Peşinde'nin{/g} 1 kullanım hakkını geri kazanır.
! Aynı anda yalnızca tek bir düşman izlenebilir.
languages.original_text:
The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes its turn.
If an ally kills a trailed enemy:
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g}.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +<u>(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2)</u> MP.</indent>
-<indent=5%>The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is reset.</indent>
When {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Hot on the Trail{/g} is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.
! Only a single enemy can be trailed at a time.

traits.locale_text: Ödül Avcısı, 10 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}izlenen{/g} olarak belirler ve turu sonlandırır. Bir dost birim, izlenen bir düşmanı öldürürse: -Ödül Avcısı, bu dost birimin turunun ardından bir ek tur kazanır. Bu turda Ödül Avcısı'na {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sıcak Takip{/g} kullandıktan hemen sonra sahip olduğu miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} verilir. -Ödül Avcısı, +(2 + hedefin zorluk derecesi / 2) kadar ilave HP kazanır. -{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sıcak Takip{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} sıfırlanır. {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sıcak Takip{/g}, çatışmada üçüncü kez kullanıldığında Ödül Avcısı, Sıcak Takip'in 1 kullanım hakkını geri kazanır.

Ödül Avcısı, 10 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki bir düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}izlenen{/g} olarak belirler ve turunu sonlandırır.
Bir dost birim, izlenen bir düşmanı öldürürse:
-<indent=5%>Ödül Avcısı, bu dost birimin turunun ardından bir ek tur kazanır. Bu turda Ödül Avcısı'na {g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sıcak Takip{/g} kullandığı an sahip olduğu miktarda {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} verilir.</indent>
-<indent=5%>Ödül Avcısı, +<u>(2 + hedefin zorluk derecesi / 2)</u> kadar ilave HP kazanır.</indent>
-<indent=5%>{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sıcak Takip'in{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresi{/g} sıfırlanır.</indent>
{g|f:56bd0b3c54784098ae7044ceae173c7c}Sıcak Takip{/g}, çatışmada üçüncü kez kullanıldığında Ödül Avcısı, {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Av Peşinde'nin{/g} 1 kullanım hakkını geri kazanır.
! Aynı anda yalnızca tek bir düşman izlenebilir.

languages.text: The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes the turn. If an ally kills a trailed enemy: -The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used Hot on the Trail. -The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2) MP. -The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Hot on the Trail is reset. When Hot on the Trail is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Bounty Hunter designates an enemy in a 10-cell radius as {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} and finishes the turn. If an ally kills a trailed enemy: -The Bounty Hunter gains an extra turn after that ally's turn, with all {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} remaining from the moment the Bounty Hunter used Hot on the Trail. -The Bounty Hunter gains an additional +(2 + target's difficulty tier / 2) MP. -The {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} of Hot on the Trail is reset. When Hot on the Trail is used for the third time during combat, the Bounty Hunter recovers +1 charge of {g|f:802d21391d2f4573bfff126023df39bb}Hunt Down the Prey{/g}.
